description:
I'm friendly, with good humor sense, calm, faithful, mutual respectful,
with realistic expectations of life, self-learner
and a good worker(without fear or any kind of job).
I have a 7 years-old dog named "oreo",
I don't have any kids ( i do want it in the future).

At this point of my life. i am just looking for a nice and lovely woman to meet her, get in love, and marriage. a strong girl with whom to fight side by side any challenge of life and win them.

I can give her my love, my total fidelity, and dadicate my life to make her happy everyday.
